flawed_nl_solution:
The family ate 16 x 3/4 = <<16*3/4=64/3>>64/3 slices.
So, there were 16 - 64/3 = <<16-64/3=-16/3>>-16/3 slices of pizza left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 64/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
